mysql

Interface DBIcategorizer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DBcategorizer

    public interface DBIcategorizer
    interface to the database for the categorizer
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Holger Ebhart

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addCategoryToAccount(int accountId, Category category)
      inserts first the category in the database and then an entry to connect the account with the category and sets categorized on true
      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getCategoriesForAccount(java.lang.String url)
      returns the categoryIds where an url match was successful
      java.util.List<Account> getNonCategorized()
      returns the non categorized accounts from the database (max. 100) IMPORTANT only id and url are valid

    • Method Detail

      • getNonCategorized

        java.util.List<Account> getNonCategorized()
        returns the non categorized accounts from the database (max. 100) IMPORTANT only id and url are valid
        Returns:
        the non categorized accounts from the database as List of Account (only id and url are valid)

      • getCategoriesForAccount

        java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getCategoriesForAccount(java.lang.String url)
        returns the categoryIds where an url match was successful
        Parameters:
        url - the url from twitter of the website of this account as String
        Returns:
        a list of categoryIds where an url match was successful as List

      • addCategoryToAccount

        boolean addCategoryToAccount(int accountId,
                           Category category)
        inserts first the category in the database and then an entry to connect the account with the category and sets categorized on true
        Parameters:
        accountId - the id of the account to categorize as int
        category - the category to set as Category
        Returns:
        the result of the sql-query as boolean
